• Realme has launched the Realme 10 Pro 5G Coca-Cola Edition.
  • The Coke-themed phone comes with a special design, UI tweaks, and custom sounds.
  • The phone will retail for Rs 20,99… [+1310 chars]

articles.title: LoL players are already dubbing Aurelion Sol rework a 'complete failure' - Dot Esports

articles.content: The celestial dragon that is as old as time itself has, after four years of not tasting a single buff, gotten a makeover from Riot Games. Aurelion Sols rework went live yesterday, and League of Legen… [+1491 chars]
